Product name: Vintage Reuge Swiss musical powder puff box. Rare.
Description:
Very rare Reuge musical powder puff box from Switzerland.
Made between 1956 and 1965.
Dark green in colour with crystal decoration on lid.
Under the lid is an original mirror which has tarnished.
Has a small dent in the side and missing 4 crystals from lid.
Puff and sifter are included but have some staining on them although they do not appear to have been used.
Musical movement inside is an 18 note, cylinder is stamped 654 which is 'Anton Karas - The 3rd Man'. I can email a video of the movement playing if necessary.
599 plus postage and insurance will be more or less than stated below based on your location.
Weighs 280g.
Approx 10 cm x 10 cm.
Willing to post outside of Melbourne Australia but would have to confirm postage based on your location. All postage charges are based on registered post. If you are willing to take the risk of unregistered post contact me for update of postage costs.

Description:
Calligraphy Dip Pen, 1st to 16th Century. This Calligraphy Dip Pen is based on several in European museums. These pens are documented from 100 AD to 1600 AD and beyond.  This pen in particular is patterned after one that has been dated to about the 16th century, this is a wonderful gift for the calligraphers you know or as a gift to yourself! 
Each pen is shipped with a small section of sheep's wool to use as a reservoir for the ink. (a very small piece needs to be put inside the pen so it can feed ink to the split between the tines.)
Each pen is handmade from brass, is about 120 mm long, 5 mm wide at the widest.  The tip of the nib is about 1 mm wide.
As they are handmade, they will have some variations in length and width and nib width.
Be aware that calligraphers who purchase this should be skilled in finishing and adjusting dip pen nibs. Each pen is finished and ready to use but each calligrapher will need to adjust it to fit the way they write.
Please visit my friends blog page for more information about this type of pen. https://scribescribbling.wordpress.com/2015/11/21/pens-pre-17th-century/

Complimentary Lifetime Jewelry Maintenance Plan
Over the course of a lifetime, some fine jewelry will need service and repair from normal wear and tear. In our effort to ensure a lifetime of satisfaction with your purchase, stonesandgold will provide the following services every 6 months upon request of service.
1) Professional Cleaning, Polishing, and Refinishing
2) White Gold Beauty Maintenance- 14K Gold Rhodium Retouch
3) Prong Tightening
Flexible Payment Schedule
As part of our overall goal to make fine jewelry more accessible to the public, we not only offer rock bottom prices, but we will also accommodate most every payment schedule you are comfortable with. When inquiring about layaway options, please provide the following information
1) Link to the piece you would like to purchase
2) Initial Payment Amount you are comfortable making
For most all items unless otherwise specified, when you are comfortable with making the next payment, contact us and we will provide a customized listing for the next payment. Once payment is finalized, we will ship out the product to you. All payments for layaway plans are required to be fully made within 1 year. All sales are final on layaway plans.
Return Policy
We offer a 30 days full money back guarantee on all our items. Please refer to the policy tab under Shop Info for detailed information. The exceptions are custom orders, engraved orders, and goods on layaway plans.
